page.title: 07THE VILLAGE SHOP 2
page.content:
SOME OF THE PEOPLE THAT COME TO THE SHOP ON A REGULAR BASIS EACH WEEK. OFTEN PEOPLE LIKE TO TALK ABOUT THINGS THAT HAVE HAPPENED IN THE VILLAGE. BEING IN BUISINESS THE OWNERS OF THE SHOP CAN NOT SAY WHAT THEY THINK,THEY HAVE TO AGREE WITH THE CUSTOMER.
THIS PARTICULAR FAMILY HAVE BEEN IN THE VILLAGE FOR OVER{100 YEARS.}THINGS USED TO BE VERY DIFFERENT THEN.FOR INSTANCE,WHEN THE OWNER OF THE SHOP WANTED TO SELL GOODS HE HAD TO WEIGH EVERY THING ON SCALES. EVERYTHING USED TO BE DELIVERED IN BULK.HE USED TO HAVE TO GET UP VERY EARLY TO BAKE BREAD.THE SHOP OWNER FINDS MEASURING IN KILOGRAMS VERY DIFFICULT BECAUSE WHEN HE WAS YOUNG EVERYTHING USED TO BE IN POUNDS.
